description: Displays help text when hovering on an element.

children.description: Content that, when hovered on, makes the Poptip appear

content.description: Text that appears within the poptip

horizontalAttachment.description: Side of the poptip that should attach to the `children`

horizontalTargetAttachment.description: Side of `children` that should attach to the poptip

verticalAttachment.description: Vertical edge of the poptip that should touch the `children`

verticalTargetAttachment.description: Vertical edge of the `children` that should touch the poptip
